00020 #pragma once
00021 
00022 namespace cxx {
00023 
00035 template< typename T>
00036 class Auto_ptr
00037 {
00038 private:
00039   T *_p;
00040 
00041   struct Priv_type;
00042 
00043 public:
00045   typedef T Ref_type;
00046 
00051   explicit Auto_ptr(T *p = 0) throw() : _p(p) {}
00052 
00057   Auto_ptr(Auto_ptr const &o) throw()
00058   : _p(const_cast<Auto_ptr<T>&>(o).release())
00059   {}
00060 
00065   Auto_ptr &operator = (Auto_ptr const &o) throw()
00066   {
00067     if (&o != this)
00068       {
00069   if (_p) delete _p;
00070   _p = const_cast<Auto_ptr<T>&>(o).release();
00071       }
00072     return *this;
00073   }
00074 
00076   ~Auto_ptr() throw()
00077   { if (_p) delete _p; }
00078 
00080   T &operator * () const throw() { return *_p; }
00081 
00083   T *operator -> () const throw() { return _p; }
00084 
00090   T *get() const throw() { return _p; }
00091 
00098   T *release() throw() { T *t = _p; _p = 0; return t; }
00099 
00103   void reset(T *p = 0) throw()
00104   {
00105     if (_p) delete _p;
00106     _p = p;
00107   }
00108 
00110   operator Priv_type * () const throw()
00111   { return reinterpret_cast<Priv_type*>(_p); }
00112 };
00113 }
